issue.title: [R] Remove as.factor to dictionary_encode mapping
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17371](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17371). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There is an NSE func mapping between `base::as.factor` and Acero's `dictionary_encode`.  However, it doesn't work at present - see ARROW-12632.  Calling this function results in an error.  We should remove this mapping so that an error is raised and we call `as.factor` in R not Acero.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17371?focusedCommentId=17599049) by Nicola Crane (thisisnic):*
Issue resolved by pull request 13836
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13836>
